title: Republican National Committee Files Suit Against House Jan. 6 Committee
sub_head: Lawsuit seeks to block a subpoena the Democratic-led panel issued to Salesforce seeking records linked to GOP activities
body:
WASHINGTON—The Republican National Committee filed suit Wednesday to stop one of its vendors from turning over records to the House select committee investigating the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.
The House panel, made up of seven Democrats and two Republicans who have been critical of former President Donald Trump, had subpoenaed records related to the GOP’s fundraising and donor efforts from Salesforce . com Inc.—a commercial marketing platform the party used to manage communications with donors.
